title: Watch: Eat. Stay. Love. Inside the Opus Hotel in Vancouver
text:
Watch: Eat. Stay. Love. Inside the Opus Hotel in Vancouver 
Need a little getaway? Sit back, relax and take a look inside the unique Opus Hotel in Vancouver.
